oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: American Ace Coffee show - 1948-03-20 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of the American Ace Coffee show (usually a Grand Ole Opry segment) from March 20, 1948. Featuring Ralph Christian (announcer), Roy Acuff (host/performer) with his Smoky Mountain Boys, and performers Jimmy Riddle, Pap's Jug Band, Tommy Magness, Bashful Brother Oswald, Joe Zinkan, the Bailes Brothers (Johnnie and Homer), and Sonny Day. Held at the Municipal Auditorium in Shreveport, LA.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Jimmy Riddle; Roy Acuff; Smoky Mountain Boys
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Bill Bailey, Won't You Please Come Home? (Jimmy Riddle harmonica) [continued from part 1] -- Roy Acuff talks -- When I Lay My Burden Down (Roy Acuff and his Smoky Mountain Boys) -- Roy Acuff and Pap talk
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: American ace show (Radio program); Christian, Ralph; Acuff, Roy; Smoky Mountain Boys; Riddle, Jimmy, 1918-1982; Wilson, Lonnie; Pap's Jug Band; Magness, Tommy; Bashful Brother Oswald; Zinkan, Joe; Bailes Brothers; Bailes, Homer, 1922-; Bailes, Johnnie, 1918-1989; Day, Sonny (Accordionist); KWKH (Radio station : Shreveport, La.);
